rules_text:
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
If you’ve cast at least three other spells this game named Unending Sleep, create Ashiok, Nightmare Incarnate, a legendary blue and black Ashiok planeswalker token with 3 starting loyalty, “[+1]: Exile the top card of each opponent’s library,” “[-X]: Put a creature or planeswalker card you don’t own with mana value X or less from exile onto the battlefield under your control,” and “[-6]: Exile each nonland permanent you don’t control.”
notes:
Inspiration — Death by sleep/sleeping forever, nightmares

Mechanical Uniqueness — Planeswalker token creation
